reviewText: Watched on Hallmark, loved it so much ordered it from Amazon!
Just tuned in to the movie and I'm such ingredients Amazon to purchase it.  Heart felt family movie that illustrates God's love for us.
Summer Snow is a great, inspirational movie.
Love the story how someone can make a difference in people's lifes
Story is heart warming.  The little girl steals the show.  Well written and directed.  If you are tired of blood, etc. this is the movie for you.
I can watch " summer snow"  over and over again. Would love to be able to download this and more  movies.on my kindle. Even Disney  movies. I only like to buy movies and DVD's from Amazon!!!!!

This is an excellent movie which puts the value of life at it's message. The little girl is adorable, and I think she is star quality. This movie teaches great values like not being selfish and living for God and doing for others. Hallie (the little girl) is very thoughtful of others. Her father is trying to put their life together after the death of her mother.

Fast delivery, great movie. This movie is not for the faint-hearted, but does a great job of depicting the tunnel vision we have as we grieve, and what Hope and a love of life can do for us - God is good.
I had expected it to be 'deeper' based on a friends perception.
Great Movie!! Great Product and seller!!
This movie is well worth watching.  It has a very good Christian message.
Incredibly sweet story! Great to watch with children.
Bought it as a Christmas gift.
